text: C. Srinivasa Iyengar was an Indian politician. He was also a former Member of the Legislative Assembly of Tamil Nadu. He was elected to the Tamil Nadu legislative assembly as an Indian National Congress candidate from Paramakudi constituency in 1962 election. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing Category:Tamil Nadu politicians Category:Indian National Congress politicians
title: C. Srinivasa Iyengar
